blogPost.title: What are some thought exercises that can help people understand the value of their time? Answer by @RomiNeustadt, Entrepreneur, Author, Speaker and Biz Coach. https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 有哪些思维训练可以帮助人们理解时间的价值？回答者：@RomiNeustadt，企业家、作家、演讲者和商务教练。https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ。
有哪些思維訓練可以幫助人們理解時間的價值？回答者：@RomiNeustadt，企業家、作家、演講者和商務教練。https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ。
人が自分の時間の価値を理解するのに役立つ思考訓練は何かありますか？Answer by @RomiNeustadt, Entrepreneur, Author, Speaker and Biz Coach. https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ

previous.title: What are some tips for writing a strong college admissions essay? Answer by Jill Margaret Shulman, author of College Admissions Cracked. https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli

localize.full_text: 写一篇强有力的大学入学论文有什么技巧？由《大学招生破解》的作者吉尔-玛格丽特-舒尔曼回答。https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli。
寫一篇強有力的大學入學論文有什麼技巧？由《大學招生破解》的作者吉爾-瑪格麗特-舒爾曼回答。https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli。
強力な大学入試用エッセイを書くためのヒントを教えてください。回答：『College Admissions Cracked』の著者、Jill Margaret Shulman氏 https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli

next.title: What are some strategies to master difficult emotions like fear, anger, etc? Answer by @MattBodnar, Partner at Fresh Capital Group. https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6

localize.full_text: 掌握恐惧、愤怒等困难情绪的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合伙人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6。
掌握恐懼、憤怒等困難情緒的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合夥人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6。
恐怖や怒りなどの難しい感情を使いこなすための戦略はありますか？回答者：@MattBodnar（Fresh Capital Groupのパートナー） https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6
